reviews.review: This game is great! The story is fun and humorous. It has multiplayer, AND you can build your own test chambers to give yourself, or others a nice challenge. Its is a great game and is easily worth your time and money. 10/10

After 80 hours of playing this game I started love and hate this game. I can say that I play this game because it unusual. Many games are shooter game. This game has portals and its nice. And I hate this game because many Russian pupils just ruining game in co-op. You can't play long time with them. When they host, they turn on cheats and its annoying. Just imagine that u want to spent free time in this game, so u go to co-op (cause I like to find interesting people) and u met Russian strong body. He started shout if u are host turn on cheats, or he left. And after then he left, we go to find another game. And guess with whom we are playing. Again with big Russian body. I don't say that Russians are bad, or smth like that. I mean that better if people don't interfere another gamers and don't ask to turn on cheats. That's all what I want to say.

They went with bigger and better for this sequel, and although it was bigger i'm not so sure it was better.

I enjoyed the reveal of the history behind the Aperture Laboratories, but the way the story of the game unravels feels a bit wrong, going back and forth. Maybe i expected a more linear progression like the first one, instead of going from tests to exploration and then back to tests.

The puzzles on the tests were challenging, and i got stuck on a couple of them, but as a whole it was fun. 
They seem to have focused a lot on co-op with Portal 2 as well, which is a new thing that i haven't tried yet, since it's hard to find someone online now, and i have to convince a friend to play it along with me. I don't really care much for it, but if i manage to try it in the future i'll update the review.

The game as a sequel is fine and i'd recommend it to all the fans, but it failed to outshine the first one in my opinion.

Really good game, honestly. Just sad that there is probably never coming out another portal game. The ending is good, the jokes are really good for a video game. Valve really nailed it with this game, even in 2020 the graphics hold up.

Очень интересная игра-головоломка с необычным сюжетом для своего времени. Игра заставляет подумать. Игра вызывает очень много разных чувств любовь ненависть... В ней почусвтвуешь дружбу и предательство. Графика плавная и хорошая не мыло. Но микротранзакции на скины роботов чуть-чуть портят настроение от игры, хотя она и так платная.И в совокупности из одним из самых запоминающиеся злодеем, игра очень хорошая.

This is my favorite game without a doubt. The writing is amazing, the portal mechanic is super fun and still mind-bending as ever, All the characters are lovable in their own way. and the graphics are still outstanding, especially for a game released in 2011. Overall the best game I've ever played, and it's not hard to tell why.

It's a very well made game with a simple yet nice storyline that is complimented by seamless gameplay, despite some frequent loading screens. It is an extremely calming game that I have played multiple times over.
I highly recommend this game for anyone looking to play a relaxing game that is still mentally stimulating

One of the most fun games I've ever played in my life. I play it fairly often one of my friends and I have never had a bad time. It's legitimately one of the most fun games on the platform, you'd be stupid not to buy it. I can't recommend it enough, this is really a must have.
